languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает весь входящий {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} по осколку К'тан на 2%. Эффект спадает после {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} осколка К'тан.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all incoming damage dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. The effect removes after the C'tan Shard's turn.

traits.locale_text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает весь входящий {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} по осколку К'тан на 2%. Эффект спадает после {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} осколка К'тан.

languages.text: Each stack reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each stack reduces all incoming damage dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's turn.
Each stack reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Each stack reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque cumul réduit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis par l'Écharde C'tan de 2 %. Tous les cumuls sont supprimés à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'Écharde C'tan.
languages.original_text: Each stack reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque cumul réduit tous les dégâts subis par l'Écharde C'tan de 2 %. Tous les cumuls sont supprimés à la fin du tour de l'Écharde C'tan.

languages.text: Jeder Stapel verringert den erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des C'tan-Fragments um −2 %. Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des C'tan-Fragments werden alle Stapel entfernt.
languages.original_text: Each stack reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Stapel verringert jeglichen eingehenden Schaden des C‘tan-Fragments um −2 %. Wenn der Zug des C‘tan-Fragments endet, werden alle Stapel entfernt.

languages.text: 1スタックにつき、ク＝タン・シャードはすべての被ダメージを-2%軽減する。ク＝タン・シャードのターンの後、全スタックが取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: Each stack reduces all incoming damage dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's turn.

traits.locale_text: 1スタックにつき、ク＝タン・シャードはすべての被ダメージを-2%軽減する。ク＝タン・シャードのターンの後、全スタックが取り除かれる。

languages.text: 每层效果可使星神碎片承受的所有伤害降低2%，所有层数会在星神碎片的回合结束后移除。
languages.original_text: Each stack reduces all incoming damage dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's turn.

traits.locale_text: 每层效果可使星神碎片承受的所有伤害降低2%，所有层数会在星神碎片的回合结束后移除。

languages.text: Cada acumulación reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que recibe el fragmento de C'tan un −2 %. El fragmento de C'tan pierde todas las acumulaciones al acabar su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each stack reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada acumulación reduce el daño que recibe el fragmento de C'tan un −2 %. El fragmento de C'tan pierde todas las acumulaciones al acabar su turno.

languages.text: Her birikim, C'tan Parçası'na gelen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} %2 azaltır. C'tan Parçası'nın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} ardından tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: Each stack reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the C'tan Shard by −2%. All stacks are removed after the C'tan Shard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
